user_input: Create a PLEXOS structure for region IS00 in the electricity category with class group transmission: create the IS00 node and add its membership and properties, then create the IS00 Geothermal category and the IS00 Geothermal Generator object, with their respective memberships and properties.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Create the IS00 node in the electricity category with class group transmission, and add its membership and properties.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate {entity_type} from the following list.

tasks.description: Create the IS00 Geothermal category for region IS00 and add its membership and properties.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate {entity_type} from the following list.

tasks.description: Create the IS00 Geothermal Generator object and add its membership and properties.
